desc: Seiko Mod watches built to flash a smirk at use and abuse, all while maintaining dashing looks, character, and value.

layout.text:
“A good wristwatch is something I can’t stand to be without. I believe that a watch should look good but most importantly be able to withstand everyday abuse, plus some. Our Seiko Mods are built carefully and precisely to deliver these beliefs!”
-Graham A., Owner, Tropic Timeworks
